programme.desc: Directed by Kurtis David Harder. With Jeffrey Bowyer-Chapman, Ari Cohen, Jennifer Laporte, Ty Wood. Peter returns to his Transylvanian hometown, Valan, where a dead body was found in the snow-capped mountains. The investigation about his 22 years missing sister leads him to the maze of grave sins of present and the past, where he has to fight not only with local criminals but his own demons too.

relationship,wrestling","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6513120/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"markthomassintek"},"dateCreated":"2019-03-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style","reviewBody":"REVIEW - FIGHTING WITH MY FAMILY

At first glance this film is a very British film and watching it I thought would American film goers even go to see it because it is very British, the humour, the accents, the houses but at the end of the film I actually realised the most important thing, something that isn't even being used for the promotion of this feel good film, it's actually a true story!

Yes an underdog from Norwich did win the Diva WWE championship belt, not once but twice!

Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style and Dwayne The Rock Johnson producing!

I will admit I was pleasantly surprised by this film and actually laughed out loud at a few of the British jokes included, because of this I now will have to eat my words and take back what I said at the start of this review, yes this appeals to British film goers and yes it will certainly appeal to American film goers also, good call Steven Merchant

relationship,wrestling","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6513120/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"markthomassintek"},"dateCreated":"2019-03-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style","reviewBody":"REVIEW - FIGHTING WITH MY FAMILY

At first glance this film is a very British film and watching it I thought would American film goers even go to see it because it is very British, the humour, the accents, the houses but at the end of the film I actually realised the most important thing, something that isn't even being used for the promotion of this feel good film, it's actually a true story!

Yes an underdog from Norwich did win the Diva WWE championship belt, not once but twice!

Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style and Dwayne The Rock Johnson producing!

I will admit I was pleasantly surprised by this film and actually laughed out loud at a few of the British jokes included, because of this I now will have to eat my words and take back what I said at the start of this review, yes this appeals to British film goers and yes it will certainly appeal to American film goers also, good call Steven Merchant

At first glance this film is a very British film and watching it I thought would American film goers even go to see it because it is very British, the humour, the accents, the houses but at the end of the film I actually realised the most important thing, something that isn't even being used for the promotion of this feel good film, it's actually a true story!

Yes an underdog from Norwich did win the Diva WWE championship belt, not once but twice!

Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style and Dwayne The Rock Johnson producing!

I will admit I was pleasantly surprised by this film and actually laughed out loud at a few of the British jokes included, because of this I now will have to eat my words and take back what I said at the start of this review, yes this appeals to British film goers and yes it will certainly appeal to American film goers also, good call Steven Merchant

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Agent jednostki Impossible Missions Force, Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise), postanawia zmienić swoje życie i wreszcie się ustatkować. W dniu zaręczyn z Julią (Michelle Monaghan) dostaje jednak wiadomość o zaginięciu funkcjonariuszki Lindsey Farris (Kerri Russell). W tajemnicy przed narzeczoną Ethan podejmuje się misji ratunkowej. Okazuje się, że Lindsey została porwana przez handlarza bronią OwenaDaviana (Philip Seymour Hoffman). Wydaje się, że operacja tajnego agenta ma szansę powodzenia. Rzeczywiście, Huntowi szybko udaje się znaleźć i odbić Farris. Wkrótce dochodzi jednak do tragedii. Przestępcy wszczepili bowiem w głowę kobiety ładunek wybuchowy. Uwolniona agentka ginie na skutek jego eksplozji. Hunt rusza do Watykanu, gdzie ma przejąć broń chemiczną, a także schwytać przebywającego tam Daviana, odpowiedzialnego za śmierć Lindsey. Udaje mu się aresztować gangstera, lecz jego sukces jest krótkotrwały. W drodze do Ameryki przebiegły handlarz zostaje uwolniony przez swoich ludzi. Wkrótce porywa Julię. W zamian za darowanie jej życia żąda, aby Hunt wykradł dla niego potężną broń. Atutem brawurowo zrealizowanego filmu są znakomite efekty specjalne.

credits.actor: Tom Cruise
Ving Rhames
Keri Russell

theory","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0268978/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chicagoconsultant"},"dateCreated":"2012-01-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Superb Acting and a Gem of a Film","reviewBody":"Ed Harris, Russel Crowe, Jennifer Connelly, and Paul Bettany were terrific.

The film had great balance and is worth a viewing.

The story boldly addresses mental illness as a handicap.

Because of the quality of the acting and directing, this movie is a beacon of hope for people of all disabilities. The film illustrates to the viewer how deeply a handicap can infiltrate the domestic, professional, and personal lives of those unfortunate to have these types of issues. I hope Ron Howard and the acting crew can get together again for something similar. This was a great film, that also serves an important role for awareness to people that might not understand how deeply debilitating these issues can be, and also gets the message across that not all should be marginalized.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":864236,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"duration":"PT2H15M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ostatnia wycieczka
programme.desc: Luty 2020 roku. Epidemia nieznanej dotąd choroby, COVID-19, wydostaje się poza granice Chin. Pierwszym poważnym skupiskiem zachorowań poza tym azjatyckim krajem jest pokład statku wycieczkowego "Diamond Princess". Załoga i wszyscy pasażerowie zostają objęci kwarantanną, gdy liniowiec dociera do portu w Jokohamie. Dzięki niepublikowanym nigdy wcześniej materiałom dokumentaliści pokazują, co działo się na pokładzie.

programme.title: Rocky: 40 lat legendy
programme.desc: W połowie lat 70. XX wieku Sylvester Stallone jest nieznanym aktorem, żyjącym marzeniem o wielkiej karierze. Jego pozycja życiowa zmienia się diametralnie, gdy - podobnie jak grana przez niego postać - podejmuje się wielkiego wyzwania - przyjmuje propozycję zagrania głównej roli w filmie o młodym bokserze. Pierwszy z obrazów o Rockym odnosi wielki sukces, co owocuje stworzeniem całej serii, a odtwórcy głównej roli przynosi światową sławę. W dokumencie Sylvester Stallone pokazuje niepublikowane nigdy wcześniej nagrania, a także przybliża kulisy powstania kultowego dzieła.

credits.actor: Sylvester Stallone

programme.desc:
Midway: Directed by Roland Emmerich. With Ed Skrein, Patrick Wilson, Woody Harrelson, Luke Evans. The story of the Battle of Midway, told by the leaders and the sailors who fought it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6924650/","name":"Midway","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzA5Y2Q2YjktZDYwMi00NTdmLThlMjctMmY5NDgwOWRhZDUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4534098/","name":"Ed Skrein"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933940/","name":"Patrick Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000437/","name":"Woody Harrelson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050111/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0452101/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7873659/","name":"Wes Tooke"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3198992153","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzVmYzI0ZTctOGM3MS00ODkyLThlNzQtY2Q3NTVlMTNmZDNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzVmYzI0ZTctOGM3MS00ODkyLThlNzQtY2Q3NTVlMTNmZDNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Midway - In theaters Nov. 8, 2019. Ed Skrein, Patrick Wilson, Luke Evans, Aaron Eckhart, Nick Jonas, Etsushi Toyokawa, Tadanobu Asano, Luke Kleintank, Jun Kunimura, Darren Criss, Keean Johnson, Alexander Ludwig, with Mandy Moore, Dennis Quaid and Woody Harrelson."},"datePublished":"2019-11-08","description":"The story of the Battle of Midway, told by the leaders and the sailors who fought it.","keywords":"world war two,battle of midway,war at sea,warplane,u.s. military","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6924650/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jimschultze"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Both good and disappointing - depends on the target audience","reviewBody":"As someone very knowledgeable about the subject, I was somewhat disappointed. Whether it was the wrinkled uniforms, the painful dialogue, the over-the-top dramatics and exaggerated explosions (hey, it's Emmerich!)... it was clear the film was not made for people like me who know the details and the characters very well.

The rating depends greatly on the target audience. It's clear this film was made for a younger audience, and as such, it does a very good job of conveying the history quite accurately. It's a lot to take on with a 2:20 movie (complete with a 6-month summary of events leading up to the title battle) and it does a fine job of that.

Correct history of this great nation tragically just isn't taught anymore, so I heartily applaud any effort to do so. I just wonder if younger audiences have any desire to learn it. So if I'm rating from that perspective, it jumps up a few points.

I just wish a little more care with the details and script had been taken to leave the older audience satisfied from our knowledge level.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":70826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"duration":"PT2H18M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Love Express. Zaginiecie Waleriana Borowczyka
Love Express: Przypadek Waleriana Borowczyka
programme.desc: Directed by Kuba Mikurda. With Thierry Bazin, Bertrand Bonello, Walerian Borowczyk, Peter Bradshaw. A documentary celebrating the work of Walerian Borowczyk, a director of unparalleled sensitivity, revered in the 1970s, who was later labeled as a maker of erotic movies. programme.title: II koncert na wiolonczelę i orkiestrę
programme.desc: Maciek Gasik (Piotr Kramer) pracuje jako okulista, a jego pasją jest muzyka. Razem ze swoim zespołem często koncertuje. W trakcie jednego z takich występów dochodzi do tragedii; Maciek doznaje udaru mózgu. Lekarzom udaje się ocalić mu życie, ale młody mężczyzna staje się więźniem własnego ciała. Załamany długo nie potrafi odnaleźć się w nowej rzeczywistości, w której jest całkowicie zależny od innych ludzi. Postanawia się jednak nie poddawać i zawalczyć o swoją godność i wolność. Film na podstawie prawdziwej historii przedstawionej w reportażu Małgorzaty Smolak. Scenariusz stworzono do koncertu wiolonczelowego autorstwa Pawła Mykietyna.

credits.actor: Dorota Bzdyla
Piotr Kramer

programme.title: Spitsbergen
programme.desc: Magda (Magdalena Czerwińska), zawieszona ratowniczka medyczna, otrzymuje nagłe wezwanie. Oznacza to dla niej powrót do dramatycznych wydarzeń i ludzkich tragedii. Gdy opada poziom adrenaliny, kobieta przypomina sobie podróże na Spitsbergen - mroźną norweską wyspę na Morzu Arktycznym. To miejsce stało się dla niej powodem traumy, z którą do tej pory nie zdołała się uporać. Przerastają ją cudze nieszczęścia i własna przeszłość.

Spotkanie nie przebiega jednak zgodnie z planem. Im bardziej samotna kobieta próbuje rozbawić bliskich, tym mniej komfortowo się oni czują.

programme.title: Techno
programme.desc: 60-letni Ryszard (Leszek Abrahamowicz) jest rolnikiem, który żyje w izolacji od świata. Jego głównym zajęciem jest opieka nad chorą na alzheimera żoną, Joanną (Danuta Stenka). Stan kobiety coraz szybciej się pogarsza. Pewnego dnia mężczyzna poznaje młodą dziewczynę z wielkiego miasta, Sonię (Michalina Olszańska), która wprowadza go w świat muzyki techno. Dzięki temu, chociaż na krótką chwilę, Ryszard może zapomnieć o życiowych trudnościach.

programme.title: Czempion
programme.desc: Marian (Marek Siudym), starzejący się mistrz kolarstwa, pracuje jako stróż na złomowisku samochodów. Przytłacza go samotne życie na odludziu. Ulega pokusie i podejmuje próbę zmiany swojej sytuacji. Okazuje się jednak, że nie jest to łatwe w nieznanym mu wirtualnym świecie, rzeczywistości selfie czy miłości na sprzedaż.

programme.title: Leszy
programme.desc: Krzysiek, po dziesięciu latach nieobecności, zabiera swojego syna na polowanie. Mężczyzna poprzez wyprawę myśliwską chce odzyskać zaufanie syna i nadrobić stracony czas. Adrenalina, alkohol i miło spędzony czas sprawiają, że mężczyźni się do siebie zbliżają. Jednak niedojrzałość Krzysztofa prowadzi doprowadza do wielkiej tragedii.

programme.title: 60 kilo niczego
programme.desc: Zimny poranek w odkrywkowej kopalni kruszców. Krzysztof (Grzegorz Damięcki) zaczyna pierwszy dzień pracy na stanowisku kierownika. Wyraźnie nie pasuje on do środowiska pracowników fizycznych. W trosce o własną pozycję, zamierza trzymać dyscyplinę twardą ręką. Nagły wypadek, którego ofiarą staje się jeden z ukraińskich robotników, wystawia zasady moralne Krzysztofa na próbę. Zdaje on sobie sprawę z tego, że łatwo być stanowczym tylko w sprzyjających okolicznościach. Jednak trudno mu przeciwstawić się złu, kiedy w grę wchodzą dramatyczne konsekwencje.

Jackson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001602/","name":"Guy Pearce"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001243/","name":"William Friedkin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045848/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0194542/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0916136/","name":"Jim Webb"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0300866/","name":"Stephen Gaghan"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Rules of Engagement","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4268596505","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjEyNDJjNWItOTk2Ni00NzE0LWJkZjctMzUyNzllMGZjOWFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjEyNDJjNWItOTk2Ni00NzE0LWJkZjctMzUyNzllMGZjOWFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Rules Of Engagement"},"datePublished":"2000-04-07","description":"An attorney defends an officer on trial for ordering his troops to fire on civilians after they stormed a U.S. embassy in a Middle Eastern country.","keywords":"vietnam war veteran,the white house,suspense,violence,colonel","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0160797/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thinker1691"},"dateCreated":"2009-10-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"" There is an unwritten rule in the military, you do not leave an injured soldier behind "","reviewBody":"Soldiers have been fighting since time immemorial. Equally long has been their history of military conduct in the field. Among the stories of men in combat is, at some point the established proper rules of behavior. As a result, a nation's flag becomes a symbol of the soldier's code of conduct. Too many men have paid the price to disgrace it in our modern era. Among the various branches of service, the U.S. Marine Corps, has created a plethora of heroic memories which exemplify their valiant attributes. Their courage have bequeathed to their country a magnificence unparalleled among the nations. That is the stage for this movie called " Rules of Engagement. " A decorated Marine Col. Hayes Hodges (Tommy Lee Jones) has retired after an illustrious career and now seeks peace and quiet for his retiring years. Unfortunately, a fellow Marine, one Col. Terry Childers (Samuel L. Jackson) has been ordered to rescue an American Ambassador (Ben Kingsley) from a besieged embassy in Yemen which is under hostile and armed mob attack. When his men come under direct fire from snipers and an armed crowd, some his men are killed. Without hesitation Childres orders return fire and eighty civilians are killed. When he returns to the U.S. Childers is arrested on charges of murder. Now Maj. Mark Biggs (Guy Pearce) is ordered by the National Security Adviser (Bruce Greenwood) to make an example of what he called a maniacal murdering marine with a hair trigger. If convicted, Childers faces a harsh 15 years in prison or execution. The courtroom drama is superior as is the gathered cast. An excellent film which gives due credit to our Servicemen and establishes the foundation of a military Classic. ****","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":44920,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"duration":"PT2H8M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Anakondy: Polowanie na krwawą orchideę
programme.desc: Grupa młodych naukowców pod przewodnictwem dr Jacka Byrona (Matthew Marsden) i jego współpracownika Gordona Mitchella (Morris Chestnut) wyrusza na ekspedycję w tropikalne rejony deszczowych lasów Borneo. Ich celem jest odnalezienie legendarnej "krwawej orchidei", tajemniczej rośliny o niezwykłym składzie chemicznym, który ma zapewniać długowieczność. Młodzi ludzie pełni zapału mają zamiar dzięki swemu odkryciu wzbogacić się. Okazuje się, że znalezienie rośliny nie jest takie łatwe. Kiedy ich łódź zostaje zatopiona, ekipa musi pokonywać bagniste tereny pieszo, co nie jest łatwe ani przyjemne. Zwłaszcza, że czyha na nich wiele przykrych niespodzianek. Wkrótce okazuje się, że drogocenna roślina ma swojego strażnika, śmiertelnie niebezpieczną bestię - olbrzymich rozmiarów węża. Dwight H. Little reżyserował też m.in. "Halloween 4: Powrót Michaela Myersa", "Upiora w operze" i serial "Z Archiwum X". Film nawiązuje do obrazu "Anakonda" z 1997 roku.

credits.actor: Johnny Messner
KaDee Strickland
Matthew Marsden

Jackson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000621/","name":"Kurt Russell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000492/","name":"Jennifer Jason Leigh"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000233/","name":"Quentin Tarantino"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0282627/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0118437/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159642/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000233/","name":"Quentin Tarantino"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2079306521","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4MjQ3MzgyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDcwMDM1NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4MjQ3MzgyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDcwMDM1NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In post-Civil War Wyoming, bounty hunters try to find shelter during a blizzard but get involved in a plot of betrayal and deception. Will they survive?"},"datePublished":"2015-12-30","description":"In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.","keywords":"bounty hunter,blizzard,murder,stagecoach,gang","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3460252/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"noahmed"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Quinton Tarantino's Most Underrated Film","reviewBody":"I never saw this film back when it was released in 2015. But, I did manage to buy a copy of Blu-Ray. Now, when I first saw it, I thought this movie was flawless/perfect. I now know that no movie despite what anyone may say, is perfect. But I am firm believer that this is in fact Quinton Tarantino's most underrated and under-appreciated film. Everyone I've talked to, says the Hateful Eight isn't Tarantino's most re-watchable film. I disagree. With a phenomenal cast that really gets into their characters. Each one stands out and not one is forgetful. Samuel L. Jackson and Kurt Russell are the stars of this film and it shows. Their performances (in my opinion) were Oscar worthy. Don't even get me started on the story. This is basically a Who-Done-It play turned into a film. The complexity of this story should make the audience feel confused and turn their heads going, "what the hell is happening?". But it does the exact opposite. Everything flows perfectly. The pacing of this film, while it is almost 3 hours, it doesn't feel like it. The cinematography is great. The score brings tension and makes the audience uneasy. But I think my favorite thing of this film, is the scenery. Having these 8 characters who all hate each other, trapped by a blizzard. Really builds up the tension of the catastrophe that is coming. The only thing that is working against this film is the lengthy setup shots at the beginning of the movie. The first five minutes of the film is plagued by it and those tend to drag on. Beyond that, everything about this film is great.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":531210,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"duration":"PT2H48M"}</script><metacontent="

But, I did manage to buy a copy of Blu-Ray. Now, when I first saw it, I thought this movie was flawless/perfect. I now know that no movie despite what anyone may say, is perfect. But I am firm believer that this is in fact Quinton Tarantino's most underrated and under-appreciated film. Everyone I've talked to, says the Hateful Eight isn't Tarantino's most re-watchable film. I disagree. With a phenomenal cast that really gets into their characters. Each one stands out and not one is forgetful. Samuel L. Jackson and Kurt Russell are the stars of this film and it shows. Their performances (in my opinion) were Oscar worthy. Don't even get me started on the story. This is basically a Who-Done-It play turned into a film. The complexity of this story should make the audience feel confused and turn their heads going, "what the hell is happening?". But it does the exact opposite. Everything flows perfectly. The pacing of this film, while it is almost 3 hours, it doesn't feel like it. The cinematography is great. The score brings tension and makes the audience uneasy. But I think my favorite thing of this film, is the scenery. Having these 8 characters who all hate each other, trapped by a blizzard. Really builds up the tension of the catastrophe that is coming. The only thing that is working against this film is the lengthy setup shots at the beginning of the movie. The first five minutes of the film is plagued by it and those tend to drag on. But, I did manage to buy a copy of Blu-Ray. Now, when I first saw it, I thought this movie was flawless/perfect. I now know that no movie despite what anyone may say, is perfect. But I am firm believer that this is in fact Quinton Tarantino's most underrated and under-appreciated film. Everyone I've talked to, says the Hateful Eight isn't Tarantino's most re-watchable film. I disagree. With a phenomenal cast that really gets into their characters. Each one stands out and not one is forgetful. Samuel L. Jackson and Kurt Russell are the stars of this film and it shows. Their performances (in my opinion) were Oscar worthy. Don't even get me started on the story. This is basically a Who-Done-It play turned into a film. The complexity of this story should make the audience feel confused and turn their heads going, "what the hell is happening?". But it does the exact opposite. Everything flows perfectly. The pacing of this film, while it is almost 3 hours, it doesn't feel like it. The cinematography is great. The score brings tension and makes the audience uneasy. But I think my favorite thing of this film, is the scenery. Having these 8 characters who all hate each other, trapped by a blizzard. Really builds up the tension of the catastrophe that is coming. The only thing that is working against this film is the lengthy setup shots at the beginning of the movie. The first five minutes of the film is plagued by it and those tend to drag on. Will they survive?","datePublished":"2015-12-30","description":"In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.","keywords":"bounty hunter,blizzard,murder,stagecoach,gang","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3460252/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"noahmed","dateCreated":"2020-08-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Quinton Tarantino's Most Underrated Film","reviewBody":"I never saw this film back when it was released in 2015. But, I did manage to buy a copy of Blu-Ray. Now, when I first saw it, I thought this movie was flawless/perfect. I now know that no movie despite what anyone may say, is perfect. But I am firm believer that this is in fact Quinton Tarantino's most underrated and under-appreciated film. Everyone I've talked to, says the Hateful Eight isn't Tarantino's most re-watchable film. I disagree. With a phenomenal cast that really gets into their characters. Each one stands out and not one is forgetful. Samuel L. Jackson and Kurt Russell are the stars of this film and it shows. Their performances (in my opinion) were Oscar worthy. Don't even get me started on the story. This is basically a Who-Done-It play turned into a film. The complexity of this story should make the audience feel confused and turn their heads going, "what the hell is happening?". But it does the exact opposite. Everything flows perfectly. The pacing of this film, while it is almost 3 hours, it doesn't feel like it. The cinematography is great. The score brings tension and makes the audience uneasy. But I think my favorite thing of this film, is the scenery. Having these 8 characters who all hate each other, trapped by a blizzard. Really builds up the tension of the catastrophe that is coming. The only thing that is working against this film is the lengthy setup shots at the beginning of the movie. The first five minutes of the film is plagued by it and those tend to drag on. Beyond that, everything about this film is great.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":531210,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"duration":"PT2H48M"</script><metacontent="
